002c5ca2-dac7-42f9-998c-f2da2e89c883.content:
There are a few ways to get some money around here, mainly depends on what kind of project you're building & what stage you're in.

The most basic ones would be to create a grant page on Gitcoin & Giveth.

If you're doing something useful for the Ethereum ecosystem, you can also request funding in the form of a grant from MetaCartel, Ethereum Foundation or a few other grant programs.

If you're already well on your way in building a great project, you might want to request financing from one of the investment DAOs or VCs in the space.

I'll create a grant on Gitcoin

I'll create a grant on Giveth

I'll request a grant from MetaCartel

I'll check out the playbook on funding

1238f1c3-f480-42e1-adcf-b13bb97cf2a9.content:
Right now, internet is dominated by big centralized platforms, most of which take huge cuts or don't even pay their contributors at all.

They control all the data, our accounts & who sees what - which they can arbitrarily delete. Worst of all, we get no say in what they do. They are essentially feudalism in the age of democracy.

Instead of an internet of walled gardens, owned by big centralized corporations that farm our data trying to sell us shit & maximize their profits, we can build an internet of decentralized services where data flows freely between applications, and we compose our own platforms, our newsfeed algorithms etc.

123b18f6-a782-4b94-b31c-2872a41de472.content:
If you're willing to take risks & put in effort, there are many ways to benefit.

The most obvious one is simply buying tokens like Ether & holding until they're worth more.

However, we're much bigger fans of people earning their crypto by contributing & building useful things rather than just speculating.

1bec5bff-ede7-4347-900c-3ed271a31453.content:
Web3 is mainly enabled by the blockchain.

To understand it, consider this: from states & all its institutions, to corporations & nonprofits - the world essentially runs on fancy spreadsheets, protected by layers upon layers of security, kept & maintained by trusted administrators inside highly controlled environments.

Now imagine a giant spreadsheet that has no administrators, a spreadsheet that can only be altered according to certain rules built into it. That's a blockchain.

In essence, blockchains are accounting systems that nobody can change, forge or destroy on a whim. They allow us to build systems that don't require trust in adms & don't rely on threat of violence (or jail) to maintain order.

26165233-7204-4440-a33d-d6077f4105d1.content:
The next big thing was Ethereum.

A programmable decentralized accounting system.

This opened a world of opportunities.

It allowed people to start building applications, program value flows & create all kinds of digital assets, all secured by a blockchain. Application builders can guarantee that their app does what they say it does, because the code is publicly available.

Of course, this all turned out much harder & dangerous in practice, but more on that later!

Then there's the whole interoperability aspect...

2a3d2ffe-db7c-4bf3-b1dd-1989efe3063e.title: First things first
2a3d2ffe-db7c-4bf3-b1dd-1989efe3063e.content:

Once you've read it, return here.

30b47b7d-1c05-4f06-98e8-d92cf59514a4.content:
Depending on what you're about, whether we like your project & whether you want to join MetaGame or just pay for a service, here are some of the things we can do:

- Invite you to one of our community calls to present

- Host you on one of our podcasts

- Include your news in our newsletter

- Offer you ad space in our podcast, newsletter or youtube channel

- Connect you to projects such as Story Guild (a PR service DAO)

If you want to join MetaGame as a project, you should go here.

If you just want to buy an ad placement in our content, DM @petheth on discord, telegram or twitter.

344b4248-0467-4836-8d93-23cec59419ff.content:
Nope! Next up were DAOs!

DAO stands for "decentralized autonomous organization" but you can think of them simply as internet-native organizations.

These organizations are meant to be more flexible & democratic; less hierarchical & with ownership more distributed than in traditional organizations.

Strangers across the internet can now coordinate & build projects together, resting assured nobody will run away with the money because its secured by treasuries that can only be controlled through voting or agreement of multiple stakeholders.

Lots of experimentation is happening in terms of governing & coordinating these novel internet organisms, this is probably the most exciting domain as well as the one with most possibilities, as it runs across all other domains.

36033075-c6f8-47b1-bf39-ae5efb3733dd.content:
Well, if you don't like our manifesto, you probably won't like MetaGame either.

I suggest finding a DAO you feel aligned with, one that makes you go "fuck yeah!".

Good luck out there! 🙃

3c2167d6-bb82-4a23-92e8-f324af991cf4.content:

All I'm trying to say is that if you're rich as fuck, maybe you'd like to be remembered as generous & supportive of the ecosystem? 🤷‍♂️

3cbd9deb-9b85-46e6-9711-931cabbf7be9.content:
Yes, that's it for now!

In short, having an interoperable database that has no administrators, allows us to experiment with new forms of socioeconomic systems to build infrastructure & organizations that are more decentralized & transparent; where power is more distributed, incentives of all better aligned with the system etc. etc.

Anyone can create their own currency that only rewards certain kinds of behavior or simply empowers local communities to transact where they were previously unable - as in the case of Grassroots Economices.

Web3 is unleashing the golden age of experimentation around decentralized, internet-native assets, financial systems, organizations & economies.

You can learn more about all of it & join the ecosystem through MetaGame - we got a whole network of podcasts, newsletters, courses and DAOs you can learn from & join.

No matter which you choose, we recommend you complete the introductory questline first.

4ac01195-94c8-4cf7-93e2-1e2e13e3b540.content:
Metagame is an approach to a game that transcends or operates outside of the prescribed rules of the game, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game.

You can also think:

- Meta as in metamodern

- Game as in Game B

MetaGame is an infinite game of leveraging latest technologies and crossing political divides to build better socioeconomic systems.

Whereas the current ones are optimized for maximum profit extraction, we want to optimize for human & ecological flourishing, in an attempt to help address the metacrisis & build a new game of life.

In the words of the wise Buckminster Fuller:

To make the world work, for 100% of humanity, in the shortest possible time, through spontaneous cooperation, without ecological offense or the disadvantage of anyone.

In the gaming lingo, META also stands for "most effective tactic available".

In short, MetaGame is about finding the best ways to play life individually & collectively - helping people self-actualize, find meaningful projects to work on & live well.

5c813b62-b07d-485b-9915-08c41aff20b1.content:
There are a few projects in our network with proper funding, but we're not one of them! 😂

If you want to get paid properly, you'll have better luck working for Raid Guild, dOrg or some of the other guilds.

Otherwise, you can also check out Dework or Crypto Jobs List depending on whether you're looking for freelance work or employment.

664346c2-14c8-491c-9107-b125fa18d23a.content:
Bitcoin (the first blockchain) is the first currency that isn't issued by any emperor or nation state.

Instead, Bitcoin gets minted as reward for a network of computers that are processing people's transactions aka "mining" & producing "blocks".

As opposed to all currencies that preceded it, there's no way for an individual or a group of people to conspire & secretly create more of it.

No fractional reserve "I'm loaning your money & creating more out of thin air" bullshit, no way for banks & governments to freeze your account etc.

It was also the first time money could exist on the internet without trusted centralized entities & first time there was a digital object that cannot just be copy pasted.

That's a big deal.

...and that's only the most basic usecase.

74aa5508-7ed1-4f41-bcc3-1be76b2e9f7d.content:
You might have heard about NFTs through 6-digit monkey jpegs & similar NFT projects that made you go WTF.

Art & music NFTs are cool because its the first time people can own originals & prove ownership online. As a result, digital collectibles have become a thing, artists can more easily reward their fans, fans can earn etc. etc.

But there's actually much more to NFTs than pretty jpegs!

NFTs can be made to represent anything from real gold & real estate to your diploma or keys to your virtual house or office - or their carbon footprint offsets.

They can represent roles & rights in organizations, IP rights & much more. Though profile picture NFTs have been all the rage, we have barely scratched the surface of possibilities...

9feeabdb-3574-4f51-9d22-7eaaf40221a6.title: Dangers
9feeabdb-3574-4f51-9d22-7eaaf40221a6.content:
There are many ways to leave empty handed & worse off.

Some go as far as taking out loans to invest in crypto - don't be that person!

From being fished in the most blatant ways to elaborate schemes of pulling the proverbial rug from under your feet to... You.

In fact, you are your own greatest danger.

Failure to safely store the secret phrase or not being careful enough has cost many people fortunes.

Most common ways to lose your shit:

- Forgetting where you "safely stored" your private key

- Scammed by fake project websites, support or discord bots

- Putting all of your money in a shitcoin your cousin told you about

We wrote a bit about security in here but its really worth digging deeper.

In fact, a whole new sub-domain of projects cropped up, called Regenerative Finance or ReFi - with the goal of building financial systems around, or contributing to, regeneration of ecological systems.

Anyhow!

After the hot DeFi Summer, the next big thing were NFTs.

af45688d-ca9d-4f0d-9943-9d2d5509c967.content:
Are you sure?

Keep in mind that MetaGame is still a baby - it sounds better than it is. Most things are under construction, it can be chaotic & not everything works as intended.

As such, MetaGame is not for everyone.

If you decide to join, make sure that if you notice anything of low quality or broken - you see it as a challenge for you to fix it or at least report it.

We're building a culture of proactivity, a community of players, not NPCs, users & consumers - the standard you walk past is the standard you accept.

b33f10cd-d58c-45a2-b4ea-5f495f2e5c36.title: The New Web
b33f10cd-d58c-45a2-b4ea-5f495f2e5c36.content:
Ahh, the new era of the internet - and more!

Web2 was marked by big centralized platforms with complete control over the flow of information, profiting from hoarding data & spying on you.

Web3 is about unbundling the centralized platforms of web2 into composable open protocols, where data flows freely. It's about building a more open & decentralized internet.

But it's also about more than that.

It's about building a whole new matrix, a socioeconomic fabric for the internet-era civilization. About rewriting how societies operate & how the world functions. About building new kinds of financial systems, organizations & economies - all digitally native.

There is a huge opportunity to take part in building this new world; to create a more unified yet decentralized civilization.

b478fa56-e26f-486b-af55-f7a5e8cc59b8.content: Perfect, then you might want to join MetaGame.

bd411759-6d8d-4cca-a8c3-6188fea2843b.title: Support?
bd411759-6d8d-4cca-a8c3-6188fea2843b.content:
What do you need?

I can give you a few pointers from here but also suggest you join MetaGame, introduce yourself & your project either way - this will give us a better feel of where you're at & how we could help you.

bd5f80cf-bec6-4600-81e1-e67266ed003a.content:
So, interoperability & composability!

The fact anyone can build protocols & applications all running on the same database - practically on the same computer, the Ethereum Virtual Machine - comes with a load of benefits.

It means the same data & functionality can be available across different interfaces, mixed & composed into other applications or used across different platforms.

You can start seeing internet as an open garden of tools, protocols, applications & communities that can be composed & recomposed into platforms.

Get it? Big deal.

bec3e326-2a44-4de5-9599-9069e4b0e174.title: About MetaGame
bec3e326-2a44-4de5-9599-9069e4b0e174.content:
At MetaGame, we believe Web3 is the future of socioeconomic infrastructure & DAOs are the future of coordination.

MetaGame is a massive online coordination game or a real-life MMO-RPG.

We're building a Decentralized Factory - a network of DAOs & resources for building them, a place for people to learn about what Web3 means for the future of humanity & find their place in the space.

Sound interesting?

de7a8d2c-6940-49f5-b455-1fa1a61f4a89.content:
Well I hope we can help you there!

It really depends on what's bothering you & what's stopping you from living the best life you can live - but more often than not, we are the ones getting in our own way.

If Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn managed to live a meaningful life in a soviet gulag, so can you!

If your life situation cannot be improved, you may need to turn to Stoicism or Buddhism to help you carry the burden. More likely, you are your own obstacle.

We live in a age of almost infinite leverage, feeling powerless is your choice.

The world is not set up for you to fail, there is no grand conspiracy to keep you down - you just need to stop getting in your own way, take control of your life & your destiny.

fdef9a64-23df-4ee2-bb57-d9cb25993c05.content:
So, what started as internet money, quickly spiraled out into all kinds of assets & applications.

One of the first was a stablecoin. As crypto currencies are generally volatile in value, people figured it would make sense to have coins that are stable in value.

And so they created DAI, whose stability is guaranteed by locking up a more-than-equivalent value worth of Ether, which gets sold if its value drops close to equal.

Soon, others created lending protocols where people could lock up Ether to borrow DAI, or DAI to borrow Ether - based on whether they thought the value of Ether would go up or down.

To increase the supply of tokens available for borrowing, lending protocols started incentivizing people to become liquidity providers - to start lending their crypto to others, for a small fee & protocol's governance tokens.

This was the birth of Decentralized Finance aka DeFi.

Fortunes were made & lost in the DeFi summer of 2020...
